paragraphs.text: I am by birth a Genevese, and my family is one of the most distinguished of that republic.
My parents had a daughter, who was nursed with me.
She was my playfellow, my companion, my sister, but even more — my cousin.

variants.text: She was my playfellow, my companion, my sister, but even more — my cousin, the child of my aunt, and she was given to my parents.
variants.note: 1818년 판에서는 엘리자베스가 '숙모의 아이' 즉 '사촌'임을 명확히 하고, 부모에게 주어진 경위를 설명합니다.

variants.text: They cherished and brought her up as their own child. She was my playfellow, my companion, my sister.
variants.note: 1831년 판에서는 '사촌' 관계를 생략하고, 부모가 그녀를 자신의 아이처럼 키웠다는 점을 강조하여 '고아'로서의 정체성을 부각합니다.
